data.message: My Facebook account in general stopped working, everything works but my messages. I can send messages but can't recieve them as they are shown to my friends as sent but not delivered . I tried to access Facebook on a mobile device and when I log it, it says "Sorry something went wrong". I reinstalled the app several times, changed my password, and even devactiaved it for a while but still no progress: also, has been reported several times already.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Angel. We appreciate your feedback. Follow these steps to report your issue with Messenger: http://bit.ly/2byEkXe. -Kevin

Facebook My page has been suspended.
Since it meets all FB requirements,
I ask you to restore it.
https://www.facebook.com/szallaskereso.org/
Thank you!

for the last few days whenever i try to access  a facebook page it loads and then this message shows up: We encountered an error handling the last page action.
